BIO

Hello, my name is Shawn Myers. I am a full-stack web developer with experience working with node.Js and Express framework on the back-end and React/Redux for front-end development. I have used JavaScript extensively and am up to date with the latest ECMAScript releases. I have worked with both SQL and NoSQL databases for back-end development, as well.
